Name: Euryale's Gambit
About the game: Euryale's Gambit (EG) is the story of a succubus who goes back in time to the 19th century United States in order to save the future from a dark fate. Join Euryale as she reunites with Spoons, an old friend, as they plan to end the practice of slavery before a divisive, deadly and immensely consequential war sets the future on a path towards destruction. Euryale's Gambit takes place in a world different than the historic 19th century you were taught in school. In this world, supernatural entities exist including gods, angels, demons and succubi from several different mythologies including and primarily Greek (but with a very unique spin). Euryale will encounter many foes as she carries out Spoon's plan. She will have to use her unique talents and succubus skills to overcome her enemies and achieve her objective. Gameplay EG is a linear-style visual novel with choices that affect different scenes as well as Euryale's relationships with others. Depending on choices, there are several 'bad endings' which will prevent continuation of the story. However, for the full experience, it's recommended to try to get all the bad endings. Features (as of version 0.11) AI (via free DLC) and human voice acting AI animated 3D images Environmental effects/animations Content 3000+ 3DCG Images 150+ Animations 80%+ Voiced (AI and Human) 200+ mins of gameplay Content Types (Flavors) Monster Girls Harem (Reverse Harem) Oral Sex Face-sitting Group Squirting Light Femdom Lesbian Lesbian-only route (optional) Masturbation Voyeurism Corruption Futanari (optional) Incest Power Exchange
